column1: Anatomical mapping for M17 rec1 in MEC with probe 92C9 (Neuronexus probe A1x32-Edge-5mm-20-177-A32)

Note on anat loc assignment for this rec: track quite clear, edge of brain not clear; layer identities are estimated very roughly by JT on 22.12.2017 from single sag image estimated from Paxinos ML 3.00mm, DV tip 2.5, AP tip 5.2

Standard info on channel nrs and ordering: we assume remapped channels, numbered by site location, ie from site closest to headstage (=1) to tip (=32); for multiple shanks this order is maintained for each shank
